title: One Piece Episode 240 UNCUT REACTION | ROBIN TURNS HER BACK !
author: Cruz Brothers React
description: Cruz Brothers' uncut reaction to One Piece Episode 240 where Robin announces her departure from the Straw Hat Pirates. This is an emotional reaction to one of the most pivotal episodes in the Water 7 arc.

title: Why is Nico Robin leaving the crew at Water 7?
author: Gear5World
description: Analysis article explaining Robin's motivations for leaving the Straw Hat Pirates, her forced cooperation with CP9, and the sacrifice she makes to protect her crew from certain death.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 and Enies Lobby arc
